attributes.action: Secure the release of Gillian Gibbons by the strongest peaceful means available
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although we have no wish to interrupt the supply of food aid to the people of Sudan we must express in the strongest terms available our collective disgust and offence to the treatment of Gillian by the Sudanese authorities.
 The total over reaction to the situation  by the Justices in Sudan has cast another shadow on the tolerance of Islam in the west.

rejection.details: Mrs Gibbons has now been released.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
